# style

**Instance Property**

The appearance setting that determines how the button presents its menu .

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var style: NSComboButton.Style { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSComboButton/Style-swift.enum/split].

## Configuring the Button Appearance

- **NSComboButton.Style**: Constants that indicate how a combo button presents its menu.
- **title**: The localized string that the button displays.
- **image**: The image that the button displays.
- **imageScaling**: The scaling behavior to apply to the button’s image.
